snippet: The sweeping changes to the Shelby County, Tenn., justice system show a growing momentum of finding new ways to treat teenagers who break the law, advocates say.
abstract: Advocates praise sweeping changes to Shelby County, Tenn, justice system, which they says shows growing momentum of finding new ways to treat teenagers who break the law; county and Justice Department sign extensive agreement, which aims to keep low-level offenders out of juvenile lockups and adult criminal courts, that is first of its kind in nation.
lead_paragraph: The sweeping changes to the Shelby County, Tenn., justice system show a growing momentum of finding new ways to treat teenagers who break the law, advocates say.

headline.seo: Tennessee County Agrees to Changes in Juvenile Justice System
headline.main: Deal Signed to Overhaul Juvenile Justice in Tennessee
headline.print_headline: Deal Signed In Tennessee On Justice For Youths
